 paste0("<a href='/slides/Week 10/Slides-Week-10-flat.pdf' target='_blank'>", "<img src='/logos/pdf-ico.png' alt='Cohen's Kappa PDF' width='35'>", "</a>")

  ) %>%
  kbl(col.names = c(""),

      escape = FALSE,
      align = 'c') %>%
  kable_paper(full_width = FALSE) %>%

  row_spec(1:5, extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;', color = "#ffffff", background = "transparent")
